markdownRemark.html:
Even though I have illustrated this, I still do not know what a healthy heart looks like..


I recently is fascinated of my decision to cycle arround Cayman Islands, fourteen kilometers everyday - nonstop. My resting heartbeat per minute (RBPM)is flirting at 58 to 64. An athlete’s heart is at 40 to 60. Mine is almost so close to an active person in sports! Bloody briliant!!!!
markdownRemark.excerpt: Even though I have illustrated this, I still do not know what a healthy heart looks like.. I recently is fascinated of my decision to cycle…
